name: Battle City 2 (Mari95)
description: Battle City 2 is a remake of the game Battle City from the early 90s. You control a tank and must protect your HQ from enemy tanks. If you hit a red tank, a random bonus appears so you may now power up your tank. It features extra terrain, new enemies, new bonus items, ability to load maps from files and saving your high score, all things that you could not do in the original game.
